text: Hey everyone! I just tried out a new recipe for homemade pizza.
Ooh, that sounds delicious! What kind of toppings did you use?
I went classic with pepperoni, mushrooms, and bell peppers. But here's the twist — I added some arugula on top for extra flavor!
That sounds amazing! Did you make the dough from scratch or use store-bought?
I made the dough from scratch! It was surprisingly easy. Here’s a picture of the final result:
Wow, it looks fantastic! The crust looks perfectly golden. How long did it take to bake?
Thanks! It baked for about 12 minutes at 475°F (245°C). The key is to preheat the oven really well. Let me know if you try making it yourself!
Definitely will give it a try! Thanks for sharing the details. Can't wait to taste it!
